detail: when 接瞬间动作、持续动作皆可;如果when引导的从句位于主句之后，有时要译成“就”、“才”、“这时”等
example: When I was a boy, I used to go to the seashore on Sundays

detail: as接持续动作，强调主句从句动作的同时发生
example: He hurried home, looking behind as he went

detail: while 接持续动作，强调主句从句动作的同时发生
example: While he was in London, he studied music

detail: 无论何时;任何时间(都行)
example: We shall go there whenever we are free

detail: 之前;如果before引导的从句位于主句之后，有时要译成“就”、“才”、“这时”等
example: He almost knocked me down before he saw me;I would rather kill myself before I apologize to him
略

detail: 自从;从句使用过去式，如果从句动作为持续性动作则意为（不再）进行该动作(多久)
example: It has been 15 years since he left;It is 5 years since he was married（他距离“他曾结婚的状态”已经好几年了 = 他离婚已经好几年了）

detail: till主句一般为肯定、延续性动作
example: I waited till he had finished his work

detail: until主句一般为否定、瞬间性动作
example: I didn’t go to bed until (till) he came back
I’ll tell him the news as soon as I see him
Once you have got used to it, you will like it

detail: 一...就;如果hardly或no sooner或scarcely置于句首，句子必须用部分倒装结构
example: Hardly had I got home when it began to rain

detail: 与此同时;在其前加冠词（the）或不定代词，如the first time、the moment、the instant、the day、every time、each time;by the time
example: Each time he came, he would call on me;By the time he was fourteen, he had taught himself advanced mathematics
略
You must show him in immediately he comes

detail: 因为;语气最强;在强调句中强调原因状语从句，只能用because引导，不可用as或since;because可以引导表语从句,而as, since不可以
example: He didn’t come because he was ill
I won't tell you when you won't listen
Since you are here, you must do it
Now that you are in High School, you will probably spend more in reading
As I was afraid, I hid myself
It must be morning, for the birds are singing

detail: 考虑到／鉴于/ 由于／既然／因为
example: Seeing (that) he was badly ill, we sent for the doctor
Go back where you came from;Where there is a will, there is a way
略

detail: 正如...，就像...，据...;as可以代替整个句子或一件事，引导非限制性定语从句;非限制性定语从句在句中主要起补充说明作用，与主句之间往往有逗号隔开，独立存在;非限定定语从句一般由连接词which和as引导;as we can see, as can be seen, as we know, as is（well） known, as may be imagined, as often happens, as has been said before, as was mentioned above, as is often the case, as/indeed it is
example: As it is, sleep is so undervalued that getting by on fewer hours has become a badge of honor.
略
I got up so early that I caught the first bus;She married him so that she might tend and comfort him

detail: 以防，以免，免得，生怕;从句使用虚拟语气，由should＋动词原形构成
example: I hid the book lest he should see it.

detail: 如此...以至于;that在从句中不做成分
example: There were so many people (=such a lot of people) in the room that we could not get in
In case I forget, please remind me about that
Unless you work hard, you will fail
You can go out, as long as (so long as ) you promise to be back before eleven
Leave it as it is;The teacher told the students to do as he did;Please draw a cat as you were told
He walked as if he were drunk

detail: 虽然、尽管;不能与but连用，但可以与yet、still等副词连用，用于加强语气;可以部分倒装进行强调
example: Though he is old, yet he is active;Though ( Although ) he was tired, yet (still) he went on working

detail: 虽然、尽管;可以部分倒装进行强调
example: Proud as the nobles are, he is afraid to see me
Wherever (no matter where) you work, you can always find time to study
Whether he comes or not, we’ll discuss the problem this afternoon

detail: 是否;使用范围比if更广泛，可直接替换if
example: I can’t decide whether to stay;I want to know whether it’s good news or not;His father is worried about whether he lose his work
The place doesn't look the same as it was before liberation;Have you bought the same book as I referred to yesterday?

detail: 与as不同，that这里主句、从句指的是同一件事物，as的主句、从句是相似的两件事物
example: this is the same book that I lost

detail: 如此...以至于;as在从句中做成分，指代先行词
example: It is such an interesting book as we all want to read
